caption.p: Sensory evaluation standards of pacific mackerel

tr.td: Of normal color, the section of the muscles is glossy, the color is evenly distributed, and the surface is bright, not with too much water and smooth.
Of normal color, the section of the muscles is glossy, and the surface is comparatively bright with a little water.
The color is slightly dim, and the section of the muscle is slightly shiny. Apparent moisture exudation on the surface.
The color is dull, dull muscle section. Extremely water loss occurs.
Strong inherent scent of pacific mackerel and of no peculiar smell.
Comparatively strong inherent scent of pacific mackerel and basically of no peculiar smell.
Slight inherent scent of pacific mackerel and of some peculiar smell.
Inherent scent of pacific mackerel disappeared with the odor of ammonia.
Muscle is solid and elastic, and sags disappear immediately after the finger press.
Muscle is comparatively solid and elastic, and sags disappear soon after the finger press.
Muscle is slightly soft, and sags disappear slowly after the finger press.
Muscle is extremely soft, and sags basically not disappear after the finger press.

fn.p: 1—Extremely dislike, 2—Particularly unpleasant, 3—Repugnant, 4—Mild dislike, 5—Neutral, 6—Mild like, 7—Moderate like, 8—Like, 9—Extremely love. The average score of each people in the evaluation group was the result of comprehensive sensory evaluation.
